VisionPage.seo.title: Vision & Mission | HeyTCM
VisionPage.seo.description: Build a collaborative, open, and win-win platform. Break the myths, help TCM thrive, and let more people achieve physical and mental harmony through TCM wisdom.

VisionPage.title: Our Vision & Mission
VisionPage.vision.title: Vision
VisionPage.vision.desc: Build a collaborative, open, and win-win platform. Break the myths, help TCM thrive, and let more people achieve physical and mental harmony through TCM wisdom.
VisionPage.mission.title: Mission

VisionPage.mission.items.title: Integrating Technology & TCM Wisdom
VisionPage.mission.items.desc: Combine modern technology with traditional TCM theory to innovate health management.

VisionPage.mission.items.title: Collect & Analyze Massive Health Data
VisionPage.mission.items.desc: Use big data to validate and develop TCM theory and improve diagnosis and treatment.

VisionPage.mission.items.title: Personalized Health Management
VisionPage.mission.items.desc: Provide customized health solutions based on individual differences to enhance prevention and conditioning.

VisionPage.mission.items.title: Promote Intelligent TCM
VisionPage.mission.items.desc: Build an open platform and unite all forces to advance the modernization of TCM.

VisionPage.beliefs.title: Our Principles
VisionPage.values.title: Our Principles

VisionPage.principle.beliefs.title: Science is Endless
VisionPage.principle.beliefs.desc: TCM and modern science are not in conflict. We embrace the scientific spirit and methods, and promote the renewal and development of TCM knowledge with an open mind.

VisionPage.principle.beliefs.title: East-West Integration
VisionPage.principle.beliefs.desc: TCM and Western medicine each have their strengths. We advocate integrating both to benefit patients.

VisionPage.principle.beliefs.title: Wearable Technology
VisionPage.principle.beliefs.desc: We believe smart wearables are the future of health monitoring, providing objective, continuous data for TCM.

VisionPage.principle.beliefs.title: AI Opportunities
VisionPage.principle.beliefs.desc: AI will reshape healthcare and bring unprecedented possibilities for the inheritance, application, and innovation of TCM knowledge.

VisionPage.principle.beliefs.title: Individual Uniqueness
VisionPage.principle.beliefs.desc: Everyone's body and health needs are unique. We are committed to personalized health solutions.

VisionPage.principle.beliefs.title: Mutual Help
VisionPage.principle.beliefs.desc: The power of community is limitless. We encourage knowledge sharing and mutual assistance for a healthier future.

VisionPage.principle.values.title: Exploration & Innovation
VisionPage.principle.values.desc: Encourage curiosity and exploration, constantly breaking the boundaries of traditional cognition.

VisionPage.principle.values.title: Holistic Complementarity
VisionPage.principle.values.desc: Integrate Eastern and Western wisdom, learn from each other, and celebrate diversity.

VisionPage.principle.values.title: Respect for Individuality
VisionPage.principle.values.desc: Respect individual differences and provide diversified health paths.

VisionPage.principle.values.title: Co-creation & Sharing
VisionPage.principle.values.desc: Open resources and share achievements so every contribution is seen.

VisionPage.principle.values.title: Technology Driven
VisionPage.principle.values.desc: Use cutting-edge technology to help inherit and innovate traditional wisdom.

VisionPage.principle.values.title: Health & Happiness
VisionPage.principle.values.desc: Aim to improve users' physical and mental health and quality of life.

VisionPage.principle.values.title: Privacy & Security
VisionPage.principle.values.desc: Strictly protect user privacy and ensure data security and compliance.

VisionPage.principle.values.title: Social Responsibility
VisionPage.principle.values.desc: Take social responsibility, spread health knowledge, and promote public welfare.
